text: Honmaru in Nakamurayama Castle Ninomaru & sannomaru in Nakamurayama Castle was a located in Owase, Mie Prefecture, Japan. It was built by Naka Sinhachirō. == History == The castle was attacked by Horinouchi Ujiyoshi and the castle fell in 1582. It is maintained as a park now. ==See also== * Japanese castle Category:Castles in Mie Prefecture
title: Nakamurayama Castle
